pages.text: A Roman-inspired javelin. These throwable spears deal AOE damage where they land, making them excellent for crowd control.

pages.title: Variants
pages.text: $(bold)Iron Spear:$()$(br)Basic throwable javelin with AOE damage on impact.$(br2)$(bold)Diamond Spear:$()$(br)Stronger variant with higher durability.$(br2)$(bold)Bound Spear:$()$(br)A bound weapon that also deals AOE damage on $(bold)melee attacks$() in addition to throwing!

pages.title: Combat
pages.text: $(bold)Usage:$()$(br)Hold right-click to charge, release to throw.$(br2)$(bold)Features:$()$(li)AOE damage on impact$(li)Supports Riptide enchantment$(li)Can be enchanted like tridents$(li)Returns to inventory in creative$(br2)$(italic)Precision through superior firepower.$()
